values.title: Dolly Parton
values.desc: If you don't like the road you're walking, start paving another one.

values.title: Dalai Lama
values.desc: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

values.title: John Lennon
values.desc: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.

values.title: Stephen King
values.desc: Get busy living or get busy dying.

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.

values.title: Babe Ruth
values.desc: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.

values.title: Will Smith
values.desc: Money and success don’t change people; they merely amplify what is already there.

values.title: Steve Jobs
values.desc: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma – which is living with the results of other people’s thinking.
